FLIGHT_DELAY_ETL.PROCESS_AND_LOAD_FLIGHT_COUNT: INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE airlines.flight_count PARTITION (FlightMonth) SELECT  concat(Year, '-', lpad(Month, 2, 0), '-', lpad(DayOfMonth, 2, 0)) AS FlightDate, count(1) AS FlightCount, sum(CASE WHEN IsDepDelayed = 'YES' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DepDelayedCount, sum(CASE WHEN IsArrDelayed = 'YES' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ArrDelayedCount, cast(concat(Year, lpad(Month, 2, 0)) AS INT) AS FlightMonth FROM airlines.flight_trips WHERE cast(concat(Year, lpad(Month, 2, 0)) AS INT) = {batch_month} GROUP BY cast(concat(Year, lpad(Month, 2, 0)) AS INT), FlightDate
